price: 27. Kokelama na bino ezali makasi koleka to mapata maye atonga?
arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَشَدُّ خَلۡقًا أَمِ ٱلسَّمَآءُۚ بَنَىٰهَا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: a-antum ashaddu khalqan ami al-samāu banāhā
